::Battera::

She looked at Vulois, still standing at the cave entrance.
She took a deep breath and spoke."You were originally a member of 
Hell Beast's group.  You invited me to join you in a mission to 
return to Cybertron. Then You and another bot spoke of betraying Hell 
Beast.  Hell Beast and his cronees came in and opened fire on us.  I 
fled and you and that other bot were killed. But the Matrix brought 
you back.  You came back with a mission, to bring peace to all the 
groups, Maximals and Predacons.  You found me.  I knelt down infront 
of you and cried, begging for forgiveness." She motioned with her arm 
at Cybershark. "He joined you and then I did, we became part of a 
group who wanted to bring the leaders of all the groups together in 
one place, your embassy.  You sent me to the Cybertron Fire to talk 
to the maximal leaders. Cybershark was sent to recruit the Predacons. 
But it never happened. The Predacons wouldn't hear of such a thing. 
The Maximals were interested, but then you left the embassy and went 
elsewhere.  I was changed into an Allince member when I was still on 
the Cybertron fire by a bot named Feline.  You returned and found me 
in my state as I am now. You talked of leaving this place and 
returning to Cybertron. But you were captured and changed into an 
Allience member." She stopped and closed her eyes a moment.  A small 
tear ran down her cheek. "When you were changed, all the things that 
I once had believed in died. Now we fight for a new cause, not for 
peace, but to help the Allience win the war. I now want the Allince 
to win the war. Peace will never come untill that has happened."

Her old programs that wanted peace were revived, but couldn't take 
full effect untill the chip which Feline had placed in her was 
removed. 

She turned and spread her wings, she then flew off into the cave.  
She flew deep into the shadows and hung, upside down on the ceiling.  
She had a view of the entrance and still could see Cybershark and 
Vulios standing outside.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois sat in the tree thinking, when another flash hit him. This 
> time he was stuck in some sort of venting system, and he was 
talking 
> to someone below. When he looked closer, he saw that it was the bat 
> girl again! What did she have to do with his life? He heard her 
yell 
> back to him, and he immediatly flew back to the cave. He saw 
another 
> bot there, but introductions would come later. He needed answers.
> 
> "Thank You for forgiving me. But I need you to answer my question. 
> What do you know about my past life?"
